title: Pick the symbols
text:
After a great effort, a donkey did not even get enough hay to appease its hunger. Oh, how he wished he could trade places with a magnificent horse. For the donkey had seen that this horse was always fed well and in abundance.

But after a few months, the donkey saw the same horse lame and emaciated on a cart. "Is this magic?" asked the donkey. "Almost," the horse replied sadly. "A bullet struck me, and my master fell to the ground with me. In gratitude, he sold me for a mockery. Lame and feeble as I am now, you will surely not want to envy me and trade places with me."
